en:
welcome to TaleMaker
You can send an sticker to start and stop the app!

Hi, welcome to TaleMaker
Send me a sticker to start our conversation!
zh:
歡迎來到TaleMaker
你可以傳一個貼圖給我來開始或結束

歡迎來到TaleMaker
傳一個貼圖給我來開始我們的對話吧!

en:
Send me a photo about your life or interesting experience.
 I can't wait!
How's your day? Send me a photo to let me know!
zh:
分享一張照片有關你的生活或是生命當中有趣的經驗給我
快!我等不及了~
今天過得如何啊？傳一張圖片讓我知道好嗎？

en:
Wait a minute
Let me think about this image first ...

Wait a minute.
Let me take a closer look at this picture.
zh:
稍等一下
先讓我好好想想

稍等一下
讓我仔細看看這張照片

en:
Isn't it right?
You can ask me some questions now.

Am I right?
You can ask me something about this photo.
zh:
是這麼一回事對吧？
你可以趁現在問我一些問題

我猜對了嗎？
你可以問我關於這張照片的一些問題

en: You can keep asking me some questions, send me anther photo or send a sticker to leave.
You can ask more questions, send another photo or send a sticker to leave.
zh: 你可以繼續問我一些問題、再傳一張照片給我或是傳一個貼圖跟我說再見
你可以再問我一些問題、傳另一張照片或是傳個貼圖離開
掰掰～有空再回來找我聊聊
